responses: Hi there, how can I help?
the right choice will be to call me choice

patterns: Id like to buy choice coin

How much is one choice coin?
responses: You go to the tinyman.org website connect your wallet and swap. you can check the current price by going to the  #tinyman channel on the discord and type !choice_price , for more information head on to the choice website https://choice-coin.com/

patterns: can you tell me about choice coin
responses: Choice Coin is an Algorand Standard Asset that powers Decentralized Decisions, a voting and governance software built directly on the Algorand Blockchain. Decentralized Decisions enables organizations to make governance decisions in an open and decentralized manner. for more information head on to the choice website https://choice-coin.com/
